text: The following lists events that happened in 1928 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Tryggvi Þórhallsson ==Events== * Scheduled air travel to Akureyri Airport started *1928 Úrvalsdeild ==Births== *18 February - Tom Johnson, ice hockey player (d. 2007) *22 June - Steingrímur Hermannsson, politician (d. 2010) *8 November - Haukur Clausen, short-distance runner and dentist (d. 2003). *8 November - Örn Clausen, athlete (d. 2008). ===Full date missing=== *Gerður Helgadóttir, sculptor and stained glass artist (d.1975) ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1920s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1928 in Iceland
